website_summaries.verdict: Solidly built, classic red kickball that will last a long time.  The seamless ball design holds air better.
pros: Works well for many different playground games
cons: Ball may not hold its shape if overinflated

customer_reviews.title: Got a hole quickly
customer_reviews.text: We loved this ball for the first 6 months, but now it has a tiny hole in it and won't hold air. I feel like a durable ball should last longer than 6 months, especially since we only play with it here and there and keep it inside when not playing kick ball. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Great kickball!
customer_reviews.text: I’d recommend this size even for adults. We all had pulled quad muscles from kicking the bigger one two weeks later when we came back to play again. But get out there and play! Kickball is great for families with young kids— you can all play together and it can still be fairly competitive! Buy this ball to do it. Just be careful of chain link fences. We had one get punctured because it landed on the top of the fence where the chain link was fairly sharp. So— maybe buy 2 just in case!!
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would ship deflated but they were inflated in huge boxes - weird! These are exactly the red kick balls that I expected. I bought them for recess at an elementary school where they are being kicked around & holding up fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sara H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for younger kids
customer_reviews.text: This is the classic playground kickball you grew up with. Tough and flexible. Perfect. The smaller size is good for younger kids (up to around 8 or 9 years old - after that, I'd go with the adult size).
customer_reviews.author: CO Steve

customer_reviews.title: Heavy kickball
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old because he loves kicking the ball back and forth with mom and dad. This ball is HEAVY. To the point that it really hurts trying to kick it across a half acre. Def better for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Awful quality. DO NOT PURCHASE. These literally burst ...
customer_reviews.text: Awful quality. DO NOT PURCHASE. These literally burst at the seams. We thought it was our fault when the first one developed a leak, but the second one started leaking before we ever kicked it for the first time. DO NOT PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Johnson III

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size kickball for kids
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know there were different sizes. So I had ordered an adult kickball. It was huge for my 6 and 8 year olds. They hated it so I jumped back on and found there is a youth size. It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Adventuresinmomlife_

customer_reviews.title: Durable and worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price because it is durable and will not break like all the other cheap balls that get pin holes in them and no longer hold air. My son uses this every day for handball and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: 84fordltd

customer_reviews.title: Seems to have held up better than the 10 inch model
customer_reviews.text: Seems to have held up better than the 10 inch model. DO NOT OVER-INFLATE! Take some air out of it to prevent it from cracking... It should be soft.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: The Best gift ever, hands down, for a 2 year old!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my 2 year old grandson. I should have had the camera ready for his face when he opened it. He wanted to play with the ball and forget about opening anything else. It will give him something to chase around the back yard, promote sharing and improve coordination. When his cheeks get as red as the ball you know it's time to go in.
customer_reviews.author: Cape Haze Quilter

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: comes already inflated which was a huge surprise but a happy one!
customer_reviews.author: Kacie Derck

customer_reviews.title: Great for Gaga Ball
customer_reviews.text: My kids use this for Gaga ball and its the perfect size. Came inflated. Cannot find a flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S

customer_reviews.title: Quality not good!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this ball for our once a year family reunion, so used two times now for maybe a total of three hours! The ball is stored in a heated garage, it appears to have cracks all over it (dry rot!?) and doesn't hold pressure. So disappointed in the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy L. Jeffers

customer_reviews.title: Good Ball
customer_reviews.text: This was a good ball, but the first ball we kicked landed in a tree and tore. The next ball we had was good quality and has not ripped, it is great for kicking and throwing. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Clare

customer_reviews.title: Good size for kids kickball & gaga
customer_reviews.text: Good size for Gaga & kids’ kickball. Came inflated and although I can’t speak to durability yet, it seems strong so far.
customer_reviews.author: MomOfFirstGrader

customer_reviews.title: Great kickball, way better than local generic rubber playground ...
customer_reviews.text: Great kickball, way better than local generic rubber playground balls. Keeps shape, good responsiveness to a kick, good bounce, etc. As this ages will definitely replace with another.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Great kickball for kids/youth
customer_reviews.text: Waka kickballs are the best and hold up to the standards of kickball use.
customer_reviews.author: NurturingMom247

customer_reviews.title: You can kick it but it is NOT regulation
customer_reviews.text: NOT a kickball for league play. It is the same as a playground 4 square bouncey from school.
customer_reviews.author: VirtualDumpsterDiver1

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Outside could be a bit tackier but overall a great kickball and seems like it'll last many backyard games.
customer_reviews.author: BTH

customer_reviews.title: Safer for my 18 mo old than a soccer ball.
customer_reviews.text: What a great kick ball I purchased for my 18 month old son. Soccer balls can be hard on young ankles, which is why they use smaller soccer balls for kids. I bought this to be safer. The quality is good. Just a great ball.
customer_reviews.author: Wood

customer_reviews.title: I love this brand
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand! This is by far the most durable ball for kickball. The slightly cheaper balls are just plain not worth it. This one will last and keep its shape the best of any other balls we have used for our kickball leagues.
customer_reviews.author: Tony S.

customer_reviews.title: Its fine, but slightly warped.
customer_reviews.text: Comes deflated and after being inflated for months, still slightly irregular shape from being folded during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Love this ball it's durable and the kids love to ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this ball it's durable and the kids love to kick it. My two year old even enjoys picking it up and rollling it around .
customer_reviews.author: Robert P O'Shea

customer_reviews.title: Quality ball, good size for kids.
customer_reviews.text: We can't find a ball that will stand up to our yard (they always get holes in them due to some trees with 2" thorns) and this is no exception, however, this is a very high quality ball for a great price. Will buy again (and again) and again.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M. Turner

customer_reviews.title: This ball is a perfect size for our younger kids to play with in ...
customer_reviews.text: This ball is a perfect size for our younger kids to play with in the yard. They were happy with it and so far it has not gotten any holes in it and we have a lot of sticks where we live.
customer_reviews.author: Laladyley

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: I love these, but the dogs keep puncturing. Not sure with rose bushes or their teeth. I have three, but am able to repair with rubber glue.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in its packaging. Once removed and inflated, it was revealed there was a large hole.
customer_reviews.author: L2L

customer_reviews.title: Great item, just as described.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved this, and it was exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Cat

customer_reviews.title: This is the real thing. The other ones I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the real thing. The other ones I have purchased just popped after a few hours of play. I only need to replace these because my students steal them from me. So they give it a 5 as well.
customer_reviews.author: rezteacher

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a week.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my six year old niece. This ball lasted about a week. Then came apart at the seem.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Page

customer_reviews.title: Great for a month
customer_reviews.text: Air hole within the first two months. Couldn’t return it because it was past the one month window. Did store it outside but was out of the sun in special ball bin. Fun while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Warped Ball
customer_reviews.text: When received the ball was so warped that it looked like a football. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CeCe

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if there's really any difference compared to a standard playground ball
customer_reviews.text: Within a couple of kids this ball went from round to a slight egg shape. Others thought it added a bit of excitement to the game not knowing where the ball would bounce. I personally thought it was a bit disappointing considering the higher cost compared to the playground ball we used previously. So far is holding air.
customer_reviews.author: foxxsmith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Holy kickball batman...it's a ball, it's round, and red. What else can I say
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than what they use in elementary school
customer_reviews.text: I expected this to be the size my daughter uses at school since she is in the 4th grade, but they use the adult size ball, not the youth. Great quality though and she is enjoying practicing with it.
customer_reviews.author: E. DeJesus

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun ball better than the cheaper ones that loose shape after a day of wall ball for my 8yr old boy and his friends.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball!
customer_reviews.text: Old school kick ball! Brought back memories from elementary school! My children LOVE this ball, it's the second one I've bought because they fought over only have one! Ha! :)
customer_reviews.author: Lidstone22

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in the quality of this ball. It got a hole in it the first day!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Dunbar

product_meta.title: WAKA Official Kickball - Youth 8.5"
product_meta.description: Official youth kickball, 8.5"; Red; 8.5 Inch. Red; Playground use. Playground use. 8.5 Inch; Playground use.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
